1.content: Your name is Charlie. You have always loved mythical creatures, and for as long as you can remember you've longed to meet one. One day, you are flipping channels on the tv, hoping you'd see something interesting, when you suddenly stop on one particular channel after hearing the words...
1.title: Newsflash

11.content:
You are excited for a moment, before you realize it's just a bunch of teenagers who probably photoshopped the video. But as you pick up the remote to continue flipping, something gives you the feeling the video may not be fake. You watch closely for a moment, and your eyes open wide as you see the centaur move towards the camera and pick it and the guy behind it up and stuff them both into her mouth, gulping them down quickly. You hear him screaming, but the last thing you hear before the video stops is a very feminine voice saying "If you want me, come and get me..."

You take note of the location, and bolt out the door. It wasn't too far from your house where the video was taken. Upon arriving at the edge of the swamp, you prepare yourself for everything you think could happen. You then begin to wade through the ankle-deep swamp muck, thankful you remembered your rubber boots. Soon, you hear a sound that sounds like heavy breathing coming from the other side of some tall grass. You slowly peer through the grass, and see...
11.title: It's real!

114.content:
You can't believe your eyes; there are TWO of them! And they're going at it pretty hard. You feel something move in your jeans, and realize you're getting VERY aroused by this. You don't care about getting dirty now; you take off every last bit of clothing and sit
down in the mud, leaning against a tree, and start stroking your cock. Before you can climax, however, you hear the female voice say "You might wanna save that for later..."
You look up to see one of the centaurs, obviously female because of the large breasts and clearly visible clit, standing in front of you. The male (also obvious, due to the large, dripping member) is standing next to her.
They are both eyeing you lustfully, and finally, the male speaks. "Well, what should we do with him? Should we eat him normally, or do you want to do our special thing?"
The female replies "I think I'd like to take the special route tonight..."
The male then says "What about you, human? Would you rather go in through the mouth, or through the ass?"
114.title: Two Centaurs!

1141.content:
You are shocked by all this. They're going to eat me, you think. You suddenly think about the centaurs' asses. They're huge! Each cheek must weigh at least ten pounds! The more you think about the asses, the more you like the idea of going up one of them. "I'll take the back door!" You exclaim. The two centaurs smile at each other. "We were hoping you'd say that," says the male.
"Now then," says the female, "Would you like to be our toy first, or would you rather just go straight up one of our asses?"
1141.title: Ass

You quikly realize that it was fliing around your neighborhood. You open the window to see if your not to late when it swoops down right in front of you making you fall backwords banging your head on the table cauzing the bowl of cereal to fall and spill all over your clothes. You get back up and look out the window agian to see if it's still out there. Looking down you see that it's resting in the play ground acrouse the street. Not worying about the cereal staned clothes you grab your jacket and rush out the door. When you get out there you see the dragon is bigger then you expected. At least the size of the city bus. You try to sneek up on the dragon by using the bushes along the fence when.....
12.title: "Dragon sighting"

13.content: What type of taur was sighted?
13.title: "Taur sighting" (Choose what kind)

131.content:
When you hear that a real Minotaur from Greek mythology has been seen in the sunny mountains of Southern Greece the first thing you do is to phone up the local airport and book the next flight to Greece.

According to the report the minotaur had brown fur and was male, or did it look different?
131.title: Minotaur Sighted!

choices: Book a hotel before you get there
1311.content:
The next flight is in roughly 4 hours, you pack your bag full of mountain and camping gear (tent, rucksack, lamp etc) and book a taxi to take you to the airport.

After 3 hours of packing and waiting the taxi pulls up outside your doorway, you sprint into it holding on to your bag. Then once the 40 minute taxi journey had passed you arrive at the airport. You check in, get scanned and eventually get onto the plane.

The plane arrives at Greece at 3am so you decide to try and get some sleep.
1311.title: Go to the Airport

13112.content:
You'll just try to find the minotaur straight away, and sleep on the plane.

Within 12 minutes you've fallen asleep, When you wake up again you are...
13112.title: Go to sleep

choices: You wake up at the camp, ready to search
You wake up in a different place
131121.content:
By the time you've gotten off the plane, passed through security etc its early morning. You start traveling to where the Tauren was sighted straight away, by early evening you've arrived. You decide to set up camp as you could spent HOURS in the caves that the minotaur was spotted in, and so you should leave it for the next day.

You set up the camp and fall asleep, and the next morning...
131121.title: At the airport

choices: Check out some strange moanings you hear
Get back in the car and go home?
14.content:
"There has been numerous troll sightings in the outskirts of town also numerous reports of cattle and sheep disappearances." You stopped flipping through channels and stayed on the news station. Wide eyed you cintued to watch as a blurry phot appeared on the screen.
"This amatuer photo was found inside an ababoned camera in the middle of the woods." The reporter was saying, but you weren't paying attention, because you were looking at the photo. The creature wasen't very beautiful as far as you could tell and you could barely tell what the sex was even. You quickly grabbed your car keys and decided to drive out to the area to see what you could find.

If you had stayed longer and finished watching the new report, you would have heard the reporter's warning. "All citizens are advised to stay away. This troll is considered large and very dangerous. Do not try to find it. REPEAT. DO NOT try and find it!"



You park your car next to a barbed wire fence and get out. Looking around you, you wonder where to start.
14.title: Troll Sighting!

choices: The griffin lands on your car
15.content:
Your flipping through the channels when you see a video of a griffin flying around "This is some amateur footage taken of the griffin that has been spotted" you hear the news reporter say that the griffin has been spotted on the outskirts of your town. You grab your keys and rush to your car.

You drive for what seems like hours, until you finally reach your destination, you get out the car and begin to wander around for an hour and you can't find anything, disappointed you head back to your car
15.title: Griffin sighting
